poemContent: Deep in the mines, behind locked doors. Lay 2.3 kilos of vibranium ore. ShaaAky and CRAzy, a SOurCE of UttER RaNDom, Rare, and purple, turned gold azure. A lure, a deadly flaw, a dangerous force, it watches and screams like your food and your drink when you drive to the brink hypnotic crystals turned gore. And BAM, it flies up, purple veins through your head, now you're dead, and trust me, it's the best you could get, as staring too long into those voidless, pearl eyes, can reveal all your fears, bring a rage to a cry. And I, declare war on vibranium ore, that scum runs the drum, on this trickster, this 'ore. I deplore! And abhore, It pulls my last straw, Then CRACKS, BENDS and SMASHES it, so I'll open that door! and I, will eradicate it until there no longer is any more. 
